data.title: Brandt Johnson
data.text: Brandt Johnson is the director, cinematographer, and editor of the upcoming documentary “Grammar Table: The Movie.” A man with an eclectic career, he has acted Off-Broadway; written and starred in three plays as well as his own comedic web series, “Brad Advice”; worked as an investment banker; played professional basketball in Europe, including on tour playing against the Harlem Globetrotters; wrote a book on presentation skills; and co-founded Syntaxis with Ellen. Brandt has a B.A. in mathematics from Williams College and an M.B.A. in finance from the NYU Stern School of Business.
